CustomField.formula: IF(ProductAttributeValueId__r.Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == "7362ISAMSF8GWNAR",'7362 SF-8GW for NAM is supported by starter KITs with different options: AC or DC powered, including a Dust filter, a mounting Kit,a power cable, an Uplink and an XFP.',IF(ProductAttributeValueId__r.Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == "MPW",'Please select if you need a demo/trial pack which includes 50 PTV + GIS users (HW + SW) and 2 dispatch consoles SW.',IF(ProductAttributeValueId__r.Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == "7750SR1",'The 7750-SR1 is available in 3 variants: Core Router, High Scale Edge Router and Edge Router. Please select the version you require and the power environment you are installing in.','According to the inputs provided in previous tab the number of GPON ports needed is "+TEXT(ShelftypeCheck__c)+".Please ensure that the sum up of GPON SFPs dimensioned in this tab corresponds with this value')))
CustomField.label: Guidance
